alert.note: Alert for Adams; Blackford; Jay; Wells (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 9:44AM EDT until July 23 at 10:30AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Blackford County in east central Indiana... Southeastern Wells County in northeastern Indiana... Southern Adams County in northeastern Indiana... Jay County in east central Indiana... * Until 1030 AM EDT. * At 944 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Pennville to near Albany, moving southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Portland, Berne, Dunkirk, Redkey, Geneva, Pennville, Westchester, Center, Nottingham, Bryant, Salamonia, Trinity, Brice, Mill Grove, Como, Bellfountain, Collett, Domestic, Balbec and New Mount Pleasant. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
